languages.text: {n}Калькасар, лихорадочно дергающий рычаги на операционном алтаре Ярма, рычит:{/n} "Одумайся, {name}! Оно лезет тебе в голову!" {n}Инквизитор пытается потянуться к оружию, но управление сложной машиной не дает его рукам ни одного свободного мгновения.{/n} "Этому не бывать!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Калькасар, лихорадочно дергающий рычаги на операционном алтаре Ярма, рычит:{/n} "Одумайся, {name}! Оно лезет тебе в голову!" {n}Инквизитор пытается потянуться к оружию, но управление сложной машиной не дает его рукам ни одного свободного мгновения.{/n} "Этому не бывать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Snap out of it, {name}! It is trying to get into your head!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Snap out of it, {name}! It is trying to get into your head!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Snap out of it, {name}! It is trying to slither its way into your head!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's operational altar:{/n} "Snap out of it, {name}! It is trying to slither its way into your head!" {n}The Inquisitor tries to reach for his weapons, but his hands are full with the complicated controls of the machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "That will not happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

{n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

languages.text: {n}Calcazar rugit en tirant frénétiquement sur les leviers de l'autel de contrôle du Joug :{/n} « Ça suffit, {name} ! Il essaie de s'insinuer dans votre esprit ! » {n}Il tente de se saisir de son arme, mais il a les mains prises par les commandes complexes de la machine, ce qui ne lui en laisse pas l'occasion.{/n} « Non ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar rugit en tirant frénétiquement sur les leviers de l'autel opérationnel du Joug :{/n} « Ressaisissez-vous, {name} ! Il essaie de s'insinuer dans votre esprit ! » {n}L'inquisiteur tente de se saisir de ses armes, mais il a les mains prises par les commandes complexes de la machine, ce qui ne lui en laisse pas l'occasion.{/n} « N'y comptez pas ! »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar ruge mientras tira de las palancas del altar operativo del Yugo en un frenesí:{/n} «¡Basta, {name}! ¡Intenta penetrar en su mente!». {n}El Inquisidor intenta llevar la mano a su arma, pero tiene las manos ocupadas con los complejos controles de la máquina y no puede dejarlos ni por un segundo.{/n} «¡No lo permitiré!».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar ruge mientras tira de las palancas del altar operativo del Yugo en un frenesí:{/n} «¡Despierte, {name}! ¡Está intentando meterse en su cabeza!». {n}El Inquisidor intenta llevar la mano a su arma, pero no puede apartarlas de los complejos controles de la máquina ni por un segundo.{/n} «¡No lo permitiré!».

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎高声咆哮着，疯狂地拉着圣枷操作台上的拉杆。{/n}“够了，{name}！它正在侵蚀你的思想！”{n}卡尔卡扎试图去拿他的武器，但他两只手都忙于控制复杂的机器，根本腾不出手。{/n}“我绝不允许这种事情！”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎高声咆哮着，疯狂地拉着圣枷操作台上的拉杆。{/n}“快清醒过来，{name}！它打算干扰你的思想！”{n}卡尔卡扎试图去拿他的武器，但他两只手都忙于控制复杂的机器，根本腾不出手。{/n}“我绝不允许这种事情！”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar brüllt auf, versucht panisch an den Hebeln auf dem Betriebsaltar des Jochs zu ziehen:{/n} "Genug, {name}! Er versucht, in Euren Verstand einzudringen!" {n}Er versucht, nach seiner Waffe zu greifen, doch seine Hände sind mit der Bedienung der komplizierten Maschine beschäftigt, er kann sie keinen Augenblick lang wegnehmen.{/n} "Das darf nicht passieren!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar brüllt auf, versucht panisch an den Hebeln auf dem Betriebsaltar des Jochs zu ziehen:{/n} "Wacht auf, {name}! Es versucht, in Euren Kopf einzudringen!" {n}Der Inquisitor versucht, nach seiner Waffe zu greifen, doch seine Hände sind mit der komplizierten Bedienung der Maschine beschäftigt, er kann sie keinen Augenblick lang wegnehmen.{/n} "Das wird nicht geschehen!"

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは咆哮し、ヨークの操作用祭壇のレバーを必死に引く。{/n}「やめろ、{name}！止めろ！あれはお前の心に浸透しようとしている！」{n}端審問官は武器に手を伸ばそうとするが、彼の両手は複雑な機械の制御でいっぱいで、それすらも許されない。{/n}「そうはさせるものか！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは咆哮し、ヨークの操作用祭壇のレバーを必死に引く。{/n}「やめろ、{name}！止めろ！あれはお前の心に浸透しようとしている！」{n}端審問官は武器に手を伸ばそうとするが、彼の両手は複雑な機械の制御でいっぱいで、それすらも許されない。{/n}「そうはさせるものか！」

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, kükreyerek Boyunduruk'un kontrol sunağındaki kolları çılgınca çekiyor.{/n} "Yeter {name}! Zihnine girmeye çalışıyor!" {n}Silahına uzanmaya çalışıyor ama elleri, hassas makinenin kontrolüyle meşgul olduğu için yapamıyor.{/n} "Olamaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar roars, frantically pulling the levers on the Yoke's control altar,{/n} "Enough, {name}! It is trying to penetrate your mind!" {n}He tries to reach for his weapon, but his hands are full operating the intricate machine, not allowing even a moment to do so.{/n} "This cannot happen!"
